page.title: 18CULLOMPTON'S OLD PEOPLE
page.content: A high percentage of Cullompton's population is over 60 years old.The Town,District and County councils help to look after them.There are 6 homes for the elderly with 25_40 people in them.There is a day centre where meals are provided Mon.to Fri. It is open from 11.00 hrs.to 14.30 hrs.and provides activities such as bingo and craft.A small concession is made by bus service for O.A.Ps. Explorer tickets cost Â£1.75,saving 25p.on a day's travel. {Orchard Lee}is a typical home run by D.C.C. 40 live there,looked after by a matron (qualified nurse),2 under matrons and auxiliaries.Others from community visit and help.Minimum age is 60.Activities include going out, craft,T.V.,films and slides,bingo and going to church.
